author: USA TODAY, Brett Murphy and Letitia Stein, USA TODAY
title: The coronavirus test that wasn't: How federal health officials misled state scientists and derailed the best chance at containment
description: The CDC botched the coronavirus test. The FDA took weeks to allow others to fix it. Those delays contributed to the current crisis.
content: The coronavirus epidemic this week reached Beadle County, South Dakota. A single case tied to travel has exploded into 14 infections and counting, with no way to know how many were exposed while supply shortages forced the entire state to briefly suspend test… [+21619 chars]
